summary: Richard De La Croix has a brother, Andreas, who has been driven insane by a notorious vamp and socialite named Sappho. A man-about-town named Teddy takes Richard to the Odeon to meet her, ... See full summary »
cast: Pola Negri|Johannes Riemann|Alfred Abel|Albert Steinrück|Helga Molander|Otto Treptow|Elsa Wagner|Ellinor Gynt
title: Sappho
